title: This is a course selling platform.(DELIVERY dot com)
shortDescription: The website is a user-friendly course selling platform, providing a diverse range of educational opportunities for both course providers and students, empowering them to enhance their skills and career prospects.
description: My website functions as a dynamic and user-friendly course selling platform, designed to provide a diverse array of educational offerings to prospective learners. As a centralized hub for learning opportunities, it offers a seamless experience for both course providers and students.For course providers, the platform serves as a powerful tool to showcase their expertise and share knowledge with a global audience. They can easily create, list, and manage courses, thereby expanding their reach and impact. For students, my website offers a one-stop destination to discover, select, and enroll in courses that cater to their interests and educational needs. It provides a secure and convenient payment system, making the enrollment process hassle-free.By offering a rich selection of courses and promoting a user-friendly experience, my platform empowers learners to enhance their skills, knowledge, and career prospects. It also supports course providers in reaching a broader audience and sharing their expertise, fostering a vibrant online learning community where knowledge is accessible to all.

websiteFeatures.feature: Contain two levels of users (Admin, Seller, Buyer).
Allow course providers to create and list their courses, complete with descriptions, pricing, and details.
Enable users to create profiles with their personal information, course history, and progress tracking.
Ensure the platform is accessible on various devices, including mobile phones and tablets.
Provide advanced search and filtering options so that students can easily find courses based on category.
Enabled email and password authentication and Google authentication.
